alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 8:07PM PST until January 13 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches possible. Highest amounts above 1500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph in the Gorge. * WHERE...In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
